trans-unit.source: Provides a way to wrap a callback method within a transaction boundary.
trans-unit.target: 提供方法來包裝在交易界限內的回呼方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Util.Transactions"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.Util.Transactions"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Wraps a specified transaction support around a callback method.
trans-unit.target: 包裝在回呼方法指定的交易支援。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.Util.TransactedCallback"></xref> to be run under the specified transaction support.
The <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionOption"></xref> that specifies the transaction support for the delegate.
The operating system is not Windows NT or later.
trans-unit.target: 作業系統不是 Windows NT 或更新版本。

trans-unit.source: The transacted code cannot be executed.
trans-unit.target: 無法執行交易的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Wraps a specified transaction support around a callback method and indicates whether the transaction aborted.
trans-unit.target: 會包裝在回呼方法指定的交易支援，並指出是否要中止交易。

trans-unit.source: The `transactionAborted` parameter indicates the result of the transacted callback that you are invoking.
trans-unit.target: `transactionAborted`參數表示結果的交易所叫用的回呼。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.Util.TransactedCallback"></xref> to be run under the specified transaction support.
The <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionOption"></xref> that specifies the transaction support for the delegate.

The reference parameter that returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the transaction was aborted during the callback method; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 參考參數，可傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果異動中止時的回呼方法，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The operating system is not Windows NT or later.
trans-unit.target: 作業系統不是 Windows NT 或更新版本。

trans-unit.source: The transacted code cannot be executed.
trans-unit.target: 無法執行交易的程式碼。
